Quick Info about me

My name is Bryan Lim, I'm a small business owner, a programmer and a retired taekwondo black belt and a new tai chi beginner.

This is my personal blog where I organise my thoughts and write about aspiration. Share about my craft and findings.

I am the founder of autistic wonders, a non-profit dedicated to raise awareness on autism.

Before my professional career in technology and programmer, I worked at Macdonald, Hotels because my mother told me to earn my keepings.
